title: Samsonite LIFT Collection
description: The Samsonite Lift Luggage collection is where light meets might, helping to take the effort out of your next trip.

asset.author: samsonite
asset.hookText:
The Samsonite Lift Luggage collection is where light meets might, helping to take the effort out of your next trip.

Shop the LIFT Collection here: http://shop.samsonite.com/b/2938768011

Learn more about Samsonite at : http://shop.samsonite.com

transcripts:
My name is Farrah, and I want to introduce you to the LIFT luggage collection from Samsonite, where light means might. LIFT stands for Lightweight Innovations For Travel. And this collection will help take the effort out of your next trip, because it's designed and engineered to deliver extreme lightness combined with amazing strength. 

The LIFT collection includes three spinners and three uprights. All these cases are extremely lightweight, with the carry-on upright weighing in under seven pounds. The material we use is a tri-core polyester that's 30% lighter than nylon, but still durable. 

The spinner cases come with four multi-directional wheels or spinners. These allow you to roll upright in all directions and make 360-degree turns, which take the weight off of your arm and make it a breeze to fly through the airport. 

Other features include cross straps that secure the contents of your luggage. Carry handles on the tops and sides of the cases so that lifting them is easy. And an ergonomically designed ultra lightweight push-button locking handle that fits comfortably in your hand. 

The LIFT collection from Samsonite is the ideal choice for any road warrior. With its lightweight material and innovative design, it's ready for anywhere.
